code: import React,{useContext,useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{AuthContext}from"../context/AuthContext";import"./Navbar.css";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(){const[isMenuOpen,setIsMenuOpen]=useState(false);const{user,logoutUser}=useContext(AuthContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const toggleMenu=()=>{setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen);};const handleLogout=()=>{logoutUser();navigate('/');};const handleDonate=()=>{if(user){navigate("/".concat(user.role,"-dashboard"));}else{navigate('/login');}};const handleDashboard=()=>{if(user){navigate("/".concat(user.role,"-dashboard"));}else{navigate('/login');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-logo",children:"DonateEase"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"menu-toggle",onClick:toggleMenu,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"menu-icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-menu ".concat(isMenuOpen?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-link",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-link donate-btn",onClick:handleDonate,children:"Donate"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-link dashboard-btn",onClick:handleDashboard,children:"Dashboard"}),user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"nav-link logout-btn",children:"Logout"})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"nav-link login-btn",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",className:"nav-link register-btn",children:"Register"})]})]})]})});}export default Navbar;
